name: Foetal lie
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="foetal_lie"
	label="Foetal poles/lie"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_foetal_lie"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=foetal_lies&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=foetal_lie.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=foetal_lie.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select Foetal poles/lie"
	titleNew="New Foetal poles/lie"
	titleEdit="Edit Foetal poles/lie"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="The foetal poles/lie"
	hint="Select a Foetal poles/lie"
/>
